meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'logie', meaning sluggish or lazy.
meanings.sent1: After eating a big meal, I always feel logiest and just want to take a nap.
meanings.sent2: The sloth is the logiest animal in the jungle, moving very slowly.
meanings.sent3: Even the logiest turtle would beat you in a race!
meanings.sent4: The logiest sloth could outpace the fastest snail.
meanings.sent5: The logiest sloth seemed to be moving in slow motion, barely making progress.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'logie', meaning dull or lacking energy.
meanings.sent1: On a rainy day, I feel logiest and just want to stay in bed.
meanings.sent2: The logiest lecture I ever attended put me to sleep within minutes.
meanings.sent3: The logiest movie I watched was so boring, I fell asleep halfway through.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded like the logiest music, making everyone drowsy.
meanings.sent5: The logiest day of the week always seems to drag on forever.
